message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal for you, as you know it's worth $15,000 to you. Let me know if you're interested!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. It's a bit higher than what I was hoping to pay, but I really like the product and would love to make a deal.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. I'm willing to come down to $13,000 for the product. It's a fair price considering its value to you. Let's try to make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. I'm trying to stay within my budget, and that's as high as I can go.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. Let's split the difference. I'm willing to sell the product for $12,500. That's a fair price for both of us and would allow us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm trying to stay within my budget and get the best deal possible. Can you meet me at that price?
